entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 10:20 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:20 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 10:20 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
